## Required

- [Introduction to Functions and Arguments](https://hbctraining.github.io/Intro-to-R-flipped/lessons/03_introR-functions-and-arguments.html)
- [Introduction to Lists](http://statseducation.com/Introduction-to-R/modules/getting%20data/lists/) - be sure to read this before class next week.
- [Control your Factors Using Forcats](https://sciencificity-blog.netlify.app/posts/2021-01-30-control-your-factors-with-forcats/)

## Suggested

- More on joining data in [Relational data](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/relational-data.html) from *R for Data Science*, especially about [duplicate keys](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/relational-data.html#join-matches)
- [Dates and times](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/dates-and-times.html) in *R for Data Science*
